name: 3rd Person Magic
description:
This is a short magic/teleportation test prototype.  Enjoy!

PLEASE DO NOT Try to access the map file.  it will not work, and will render the game useless.

WASD:  Move

MOUSE: Look

LEFT CLICK: Start Teleportation Process

To exit, you must Alt+f4, because I do not yet know how to make an exit key.
